description:
I know I’ve been talking about avoiding vaccines a lot lately, but I think it’s very important people are aware of what may be going on. This is how they do it, create a problem and sell (or in this case provide) the solution, which will always benefit the person with the solution. The problem is the coronavirus and the solution will be vaccines (and possibly an RFID chip to prove you’ve been vaccinated, research #ID2020). Major news networks, Bill Bates, WHO, Inovio and other major vaccine companies are all talking about making vaccines for the coronavirus and billions of dollars are being poured into vaccine development. How will this work? They will implement mandatory vaccines that are created using synthetic DNA and people will not be able to return to work or school, or buy or sell in society unless they have been vaccinated. They will tell you it’s for your safety because non vaccinated people are a danger to society. The Bible says in Revelations 13-17 “no one will be able to buy or sell, except the one who has the mark...” The choice is yours, get the mark of the beast or refuse it. This is spiritual warfare being played out in the physical realm. Not everyone will listen and many people will still get the vaccines but the warriors who refuse the vaccines will win spiritually and the ones who accept the mark of the beast...... you’re entitled to your own beliefs but to see what the Bible says about those who accept the mark of the beast see Revelations 14:9... -
-
-
